# Overview

As I begin my journey learning how to code in C#, I created a Hello World Software with a simple variable holding the string "Hello World" and I print the string using the Console.Writeline.

Hello World in C#


[Software Demo Video](https://youtu.be/YZgbsJw38sY)

# Development Environment

This program was created on Visual Studio Code and the NET framework to running C# had to be installed to make this work.
